base.title: Baked Like a Bractus
base.description: Right now this Bractus can only produce XP, but he's eager to do more!

rest.title: Doughy Drought
rest.description: In the pounding desert heat, this young Bractus only has the strength to provide one Bread Essence every hour.

rest.title: Bread Buddies
rest.description: This adorable Bractus's unbridled hopes and aspirations make neighboring Bracti feel confident about the future, allowing them to produce 15% as bountiful yields.

rest.title: Journey to the Yeast
rest.description: The Bread Heavens part and a crisp, golden light shines down on this Bractus, blessing it with 10% faster resource production.

rest.title: Rockin' and Rollin'
rest.description: Tall and proud with the horizon extended ahead, this Bractus now produces resources at a 10% higher rate.

rest.title: On the Rise
rest.description: Your Bractus has grown quite high above the ground, and is now able to give you a Bractus Seed 9% of the time. Boosts to the size of your Bractus's yields will increase this chance, as well as the number of seeds you receive.

rest.title: Agglutination
rest.description: It seems like some powerful compounds are clumping together in your Bractus's photoreceptor units, as well as in its kneading organs! It can now produce 5% larger yields!

rest.title: Just Desserts
rest.description: Desert, dessert, desert, deserted by your friends in this horrible desert with no dessert ... but what's the difference when the sun has baked your brain to a nice crispy golden brown? Your Bractus can now produce 7% larger yields!

rest.title: Playdough
rest.description: I'm sure you got yelled at as a kid for smushing your bread into tiny little balls ... no? Well that's what your Bractus has been up to, except these compressed bread things seem to be especially useful ...

rest.title: Birds and the Bread
rest.description: This Bractus has lived long and now can spread life across the vast reaches of the desert.

rest.title: Biscuits 'n Gravy
rest.description: Your Bractus has decided to start preparing Biscuits 'n Gravy for all of the other Bracti nearby. They find this delicious concoction to be quite invigorating, and as a result they can produce yields 15% more often!

rest.title: Gravy 'n Biscuits
rest.description: Your Bractus has decided to start sharing its illustrious Biscuits 'n Gravy recipe with all the other Bracti nearby, allowing them to produce yields 30% faster.

rest.title: Son of a Biscuit Eater
rest.description: Your Bractus has developed spikes which are well over a meter long. These deter carnivorous desert unicorns, allowing your now-unhindered Bractus to produce yields at a 10% faster rate.

rest.title: Butter My Biscuits
rest.description: Your Bractus has developed the ability to draw in its spikes and has now begun to secrete a delicious buttery substance which attracts nearby carnivorous unicorns. Once the unicorns begin licking the buttery substance off of the Bractus's skin, your Bractus releases its spikes again, piercing the pale, white, bioluminescent flesh of the unicorns and draining their vital organs. This newfound source of nutrients allows your Bractus to produce 35% larger yields!

rest.title: Artificial Inflation
rest.description: You know how when you open a bag of chips only to find that it's already half empty? Your Bractus figured out how to accomplish something similar by putting more air bubbles in its bread! Expect 15% more bountiful yields from here!

rest.title: Bread Growers' Association
rest.description: Your Bractus forms an official unofficial regulatory body with the other bractuses nearby, allowing them to produce 20% larger yields!

rest.title: Bread Growers' Guild
rest.description: Your Bractus's Bread Growers' Association is now complete with hazing, violent riots, freemason connections and 35% larger yields for all neighboring Bracti!

rest.title: Breadbox
rest.description: Is your Bractus bigger than a breadbox? Why, now it most certainly is, so you can expect 20% greater yields!

rest.title: Bread of Kings
rest.description: Bread has always been a staple fit for kings, and now bread returns the favor, giving you a recipe that will make any Rolling Pins into the pinnacle of majesty.

base.title: Crystal-less Chrysalis
base.description: Born without a single gem to its name, this plant will only be able to give you XP for now.

rest.title: Intelligent Investment
rest.description: What it lacks in luster, it makes up for in its potential, but for now this Coffea Cyl can only give you an Energy Crystal every hour.

rest.title: Night Shift
rest.description: Uncovering some grime reveals that the Cyl Crystal was more orange than originally thought. The cheery hue inspires nearby Coffea Cyl to produce 15% larger yields.

rest.title: Periodic Coffee Table
rest.description: This Coffea Cyl has been working on a formula that should allow it to get more work done in less time. After ingesting it, your plant has its production speed boosted by a factor of 1.1!

rest.title: Caffeine Catastrophe
rest.description: Turns out that formula was just caffeine, and it's made your plant a bit too hyper... Well, at least you get another 10% speed boost.

rest.title: Not Quite Ripe Yet
rest.description: Gives off a lingering scent of apples. This plant has become unexpectedly useful, and now has a 9% chance of also yielding Coffea Cyl Seeds. The chance and amount will scale up with boosts to yield size.

rest.title: Warm Up
rest.description: If you thought this plant was useful before, it might surprise you to hear that it was just getting started. It's begun to absorb even more light from the sun, and now this Coffea Cyl can support a 5% yield boost!

rest.title: Roasted!
rest.description: The sun's glaring heat has roasted this Cyl's arcane chemical compounds to dark, aromatic perfection, allowing it to produce 7% more during yields.

rest.title: Chromatic Concentration
rest.description: Your Coffea Cyl has found that if it focuses all of its electromagnetic intensity on just a handful of Cyl Crystals, it can concentrate all of them into a single extremely compressed crystcyl.

rest.title: Sparks of Brilliance
rest.description: The rays passing through the glistening boughs of polished Cyl can now ignite life when certain materials are present, allowing for the flame of life to carry on.

rest.title: Espresso Your Feelings
rest.description: This Coffea Cyl has grown to be quite empathic, and can commonly be found talking with others of its kind about their problems. As a result, its neighbors can produce yields 15% more often.

rest.title: Cylli Me
rest.description: This plant's antics lighten the burden of neighboring plants hard work in the field all day. They even allow them to work 1.3 times faster.

rest.title: 100% Organic
rest.description: The natural wildfires of great forests reinvigorate the growth of the forest; the 100% organic flames in the branches of this Cyl are similarly vital, and they seem to allow it to produce yields 10% faster!

rest.title: Crystalline Bean
rest.description: The shine of the mystical crystals forming on this plant's limbs create ripples of warm energy in the air. Occasional sparks ignite around it, and your plant gains a 35% yield boost!

rest.title: Clear As Crystal
rest.description: Searing heat on a hot summer's day makes the horizon shimmer and shift; your Coffea Cyl seems to be enveloped with a similar shimmer, and its yields are now 15% more bountiful as a result.

rest.title: Something Brewing
rest.description: All the plants in the neighborhood know that something is up...Clouds gather around your plant. Of course, these are the effect of its famous coffee, made from the remains of distant cousins! Your plant shares these stewed entrails to its neighbors, giving them a 1.2 times boost to all yields!

rest.title: Towards the Horizon
rest.description: Shining like a fiery afternoon sky, the beams of light fragmenting from this Coffea Cyl empowers others of its kind nearby with a 35% boost to yields for its neighbors.

rest.title: Caesar's Pride
rest.description: Named after a season known for landscapes of brightly-colored leaves, the august shine of this plant's crystalline structure multiplies the yield of this plant by 1.20.

rest.title: Orange You Glad?
rest.description: Imbued with the power of the stars themselves, this Coffea Cyl has ascended to a whole new level of power. It's aura can be imbued into a Cyl Wand over time, giving it the power and properties of a Cytrus Staff.

base.title: Ivy Initiation
base.description: This Vine is at the bottom of the ladder for now, but it will soon climb to the top, giving you XP along the way.

rest.title: Really Got a Hold On Me
rest.description: You're so fond of this little vine you just wanna love it forever and not let go. After all, it can already produce Hacker Spirit for you every hour!

rest.title: Duct Duct Goose
rest.description: This Vine has constructed a vocal cord for itself out of duct tape, which allows it to communicate effectively with other nearby Hacker Vibes Vines using an assortment of goose sounds, increasing the size of their yields by 15%.

rest.title: Hacker Culture Horticulture
rest.description: This Vine has had some time alone on some forums, and has learned to optimize its production to be 1.1 times as fast.

rest.title: Fey Fines
rest.description: The elves made a mistake when they leased this land to you! As compensation, they weave arcane runes into the air, making this plant produce Hacker Spirit 10% faster!

rest.title: Life Vine
rest.description: A saving grace for its species, this Vine now has the ability to spread its offspring throughout the universe by producing speeds. For now, there's a 9% chance of getting a bundle of seeds at each yield, but seed drop rates and amounts will increase along with any yield size upgrades.

rest.title: Perrenial Programming
rest.description: Making amazing things is the gift that keeps on coming back, and in the case of your vine, it'll keep coming back bigger than ever! Your vine can now produce 5% larger yields.

rest.title: Stem Education
rest.description: After taking a class on the optimal stem width to rigidness ratio, your vine is now able to hold more Hacker Spirit aloft on its branches. Expect 7% greater yields!

rest.title: Vine Combined
rest.description: By slapping some duct tape on old Hacker Spirits, this Vine can make hacksprits with the power of five Spirits in one!

rest.title: Ivy League
rest.description: Getting into the Ivy League is no small feat, but this plant makes it look easy. After many all-nighters, it even learned how to engineer life on its own!

rest.title: Morning Glory
rest.description: Most people think that programmers are night owls, but this Hacker Vibes Vine prefers it when the bright rays of early morning sunlight make their leaves glisten with dew. Quiet reflection during these early mornings has made this vine realize how to help its neighbors produce 15% larger yields!

rest.title: Social Climber
rest.description: Having a pretty amicable personality allows this Vine to make friends with peers in its field. Its helpful responses and support makes him a platform for giving others a 30% boost to yield speed.

rest.title: Honeysuckle, I'm Home
rest.description: Due to its size, this Vine has become home to a few small creatures, especially birds. Of course, these creatures take care of their home sweet home, and help make yields 10% faster.

rest.title: Scandent Sourcerer
rest.description: This code wizard uses some spooky black magic shortcuts to make yields have 35% more resources.

rest.title: Back to Our Roots
rest.description: Remembering its passion-filled projects from its youth, this Vine redoubles its efforts into making, which boosts the magnitude of its production by 1.15.

rest.title: Ivy Induction
rest.description: When your coding prowess is well-known, it isn't unheard of for secret organizations to reach out. This Vine joined its local cult, sharing its skills as well as improving yields for neighbors by 20%.

rest.title: Cult Conduction
rest.description: With your Vine's contributions to the cult, it has become a high-ranking member. Your Vine uses its new status to support nearby members a further 35%.

rest.title: Cloud Vine
rest.description: Your Hacker Vibes Vine can now upload all of its extra Hacker Spirit onto the cloud, so it can simply focus on producing new Hacker Spirit (and other goods as the case may be, of course). Expect 20% larger yields!

rest.title: Botany Oddity
rest.description: After many protein pills and excessive amounts of coffee, this Vine has grown into space! Its many leaves float in a peculiar way, and it says the planet looks pretty blue. While watching the stars swirl around, it had an epiphany, and can now upgrade your Vine Keyboards into Jungleboards.
